price: او خلكو ته د هغوی شيان كم مه وركوئ، په ځمكه كې فساد مه خپروئ.
arabic: وَلَا تَبۡخَسُواْ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشۡيَآءَهُمۡ وَلَا تَعۡثَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: walā tabkhasū al-nāsa ashyāahum walā taʿthaw fī al-arḍi muf'sidīna
